Articles.Content:
So, I downloaded the KSP demo, and clicked Start Game.

Then I tried all three options I got, and the only thing that worked was the fourth, Back.

Why can't I play the game? Can I have some help?

The demo has officially been pulled from circulation, so any downloadable you might find can not be guaranteed to actually work, nor is it safe from potentially malicious extra goodies left in the install package. 
 

But for what it’s worth, it sounds like you used the launcher, which hasn’t really worked for about a decade.   Just launch (if you feel safe enough to do so) straight from the ksp.exe (or whatever it is) file.

1 minute ago, Gargamel said:

The demo has officially been pulled from circulation, so any downloadable you might find can not be guaranteed to actually work, nor is it safe for potentially malicious extra goodies left in the install package. 
 

But for what it’s worth, it sounds like you used the launcher, which hasn’t really worked for about a decade.   Just launch (if you feel safe enough to do so) straight from the ksp.exe (or whatever it is) file.  

I launched straight from the KSP file. Any other suggestions?

 

- PGC7813YT

4 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

The demo has officially been pulled from circulation, so any downloadable you might find can not be guaranteed to actually work, nor is it safe from potentially malicious extra goodies left in the install package. 
 

But for what it’s worth, it sounds like you used the launcher, which hasn’t really worked for about a decade.   Just launch (if you feel safe enough to do so) straight from the ksp.exe (or whatever it is) file.  

Nevermind! I got it to work. Thank you for the help though!

Please note that Squad no longer supports the demo.  Also, the demo is based on a very old and outdated version of Kerbal Space Program. Because of this, we no longer feel it is a good measure for new players to know if they will like the game.

Note: I'm going to lock this post as the issue has been resolved.
